item.description:
A Night out with the stars!

Casual observing in Charlton Mass



May 24th at 8 pm



This MeetUp is going to be a great opportunity to invite the public to a night out with the stars, A fun night out with anyone who has an interest in backyard astronomy. No pressure this evening. The night consisting of setting up our telescopes and searching for treasures in the night sky. Welcoming anyone interested to join us!
This astronomy date has been shown on the local television channel and posted on the Buffumville Dam web site. I think there are possibilities of more members joining the group on this night.

Were all new to backyard astronomy. If we are asked any questions please answer the best you can, this is a casual night out and there is no pressure. If you do not know the answer to a question its ok!



If there is a non-member who would like to look at your telescope please welcome them to do so, this will be a fun evening for everyone!



Bring bug spray / lawn chairs / coffee and snacks!
item.how_to_find_us: Large Astronomy Tonight (sign) in parking lot.
item.name: A Night out with the stars! Casual observing in Charlton Mass
